cards.title: Fenrir
gameplay: If you are instructed to Transform, replace this card with Fenrir Wolf Form.
powers: One Hero may draw a card now. If no cards are drawn this way, Fenrir may Transform.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
One hero may deal 1 target 2 Psychic damage
One Hero deals themself 1 Psychic damage, then that Hero may use a power.

openingLines.default: Do you fear the Big Bad Wolf? You should.
openingLines.RedHoodCharacter: You endanger everyone with this foolish plan, Marion!
openingLines.SkollCharacter: Stop now, Skoll, before you destroy everything!
openingLines.MooneaterCharacter: You have taken this too far, Skoll! Look at what you have become!

cards.title: Fenrir
gameplay: If you are instructed to Detransform, replace this card with Fenrir Human Form
At the start of your turn, either discard a card or Detransform
body: Rend
powers: Fenrir deals 1 target 2 Melee Damage. If the target is destroyed, Fenrir may deal 1 target 2 Psychic damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero deals 1 target 2 Psychic damage.
Destroy one target with less than 3 HP.

cards.title: Transforming Howl
body: Transform.
Deal each Non-Hero target 1 Psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: The Monsters in the dark were always meant to scare naughty children.

cards.title: Pale Moon Pendant
body: {Grayson}: At the start of your turn, you may draw a card
{Wolf}: When you discard a card, Fenrir may regain 1 HP

flavorQuotes.text: Remember, even in the darkness, there will always be light to guide you home.

cards.title: Fear the Wolf
body: Increase Psychic damage dealt by Fenrir by 1
{Grayson}: When you draw a card, Fenrir may deal 1 target 1 Psychic damage
{Wolf}: When Fenrir deals Melee damage to a target, you may discard a card. If you do, Fenrir deals that target 2 Psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I fear that one day I may not be able to control it...

cards.flavorReference: Fenrir, As The Moon Turns Red

cards.title: The Wolf Within
body: Increase Melee damage dealt by Fenrir by 1
{Grayson}: When Fenrir takes damage, draw a card. If you have more than 7 cards in hand, Transform
{Wolf}: When Fenrir takes damage, he may deal the source of that damage 1 Melee damage

flavorQuotes.text: It's called the 'Wolf Within'. It's a blessing, and a curse.

cards.flavorReference: Fenrir, The Monster at Summer Camp

cards.title: Refocus
body: You may discard any number of cards
Detransform
Draw cards until you have 4 in hand

cards.title: Knowledge and Power
body: Fenrir deals himslef up to 3 Infernal damage. X on this card is equal to the amount of Infernal damage taken this way
{Grayson}: You may draw up to X cards
{Wolf}: Fenrir either deals up to X targets 1 Psychic damage each or 1 target X Melee damage each

cards.title: Control and Rage
body: At the end of your turn, if there are 7 or more cards under this, destroy it. Fenrir deals 1 target X Melee damage where X is the number of cards under this.
{Grayson}: At the start of your turn, you may destroy a card from under this to draw a card
{Wolf}: When you discard a card, you may put it under this card

flavorQuotes.text: Fenrir stands for all of us who struggle with their own battles.

cards.title: The Other Hand
body: {Grayson}: You may play an additional card during your play phase
{Wolf}: When Fenrir deals Melee damage, he may discard a card to deal that same damage to a second target

cards.title: Wild Swing
body: {Grayson}: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a One-Shot, put it into play, otherwise put it in your hand.
{Wolf}: Fenrir deals 1 target 5 Melee damage. If this damage destroys the target, Fenrir may deal a second target 3 Melee damage
cards.flavorText: You know what? I'll take those odds!

cards.title: Natural Weapons
powers: {Grayson}: One player may search their deck for an Ongoing and put it into play. If no card enters play this way, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: A sharp mind, even sharper claws.

cards.title: Honed Discipline
body: When Fenrir takes Infernal damage, increase the next damage dealt by Fenrir to a Non-Hero target by the amount of damage taken this way
At the start of your turn, Fenrir may deal himself 1 Infernal damage. If Fenrir does not take damage this way, destroy this card.
powers: Fenrir deals himself 1 Infernal damage, then deals 1 Non-Hero target 2 Melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Only through honed focus can we repair your soul after what the Blood Moon did to you.

cards.title: Endure Pain
body: Reduce the damage dealt to Fenrir by Villain Targets by 1
Increase Infernal damage dealt to Fenrir by 1
When Fenrir would take more than 3 damage in a single blow, you may destroy this card to negate that damage

flavorQuotes.text: I will endure this pain.{BR}I *must* endure this pain.

cards.title: Brain and Brawn
body: {Grayson}: You may destroy a Villain Ongoing. If you do not, draw a card
{Wolf}: Deal 1 target 4 Melee damage

flavorQuotes.text: Clever as a fox, strong as an ox.{BR}I could just swoon.

cards.title: Hack and Slash
body: {Grayson}: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. You may put 1 into your hand. Put the rest back on top of your deck in any order.
{Wolf}: Fenrir deals up to 3 targets 2 Melee damage each

cards.title: Intimidate
body: {Grayson}: Fenrir deals 1 target 2 Psychic damage. If this damage destroys the target, you may draw a card
{Wolf}: Fenrir deals each Non-Hero target 1 Psychic damage. Targets dealt damage this way deal 1 less damage until the start of Fenrir's next turn

flavorQuotes.text: I'd say that's the sound of him passing the Intimidation check.
